perturbation.changed_text: 2.1 Western Copper covenants and agrees with Glamis that, for a period of 2 years after the Effective Date, it will not, directly or indirectly, either individually or in partnership or jointly or in conjunction with any Person, which will include being a principal, agent, shareholder, or advisor of such Person or in any other manner whatsoever, carry on or be engaged in Mining Activities in the Area of Non-Competition. Notwithstanding the above, Western Copper may engage in Mining Activities with express written consent from Glamis, which Glamis may grant or withhold at its sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that Western Copper cannot engage in Mining Activities within the Area of Non-Competition, but then allows for the possibility of engaging in such activities with Glamis's permission. This creates uncertainty as to whether the non-compete is absolute or conditional.

perturbation.original_text: 4.10 This Agreement may be terminated at any time by agreement in writing executed by the parties.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.10 This Agreement may be terminated at any time by agreement in writing executed by the parties. However, in the event of a hostile takeover of either Glamis or Western Copper, the agreement may be terminated unilaterally by the entity that is not subject to the hostile takeover.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction. The original clause states that termination requires written agreement from both parties. The added text allows for unilateral termination in the event of a hostile takeover, thus contradicting the need for mutual agreement. This creates uncertainty about the conditions under which the agreement can be terminated.

perturbation.original_text: 3.3 Each of Western Copper and Glamis agree that all restrictions in this Agreement  applicable to them are reasonable and valid, and all defences to the strict enforcement thereof by  Western Copper or Glamis, as the case may be, arc hereby waived by them.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.3 Each of Western Copper and Glamis agree that all restrictions in this Agreement applicable to them are reasonable and valid, and all defences to the strict enforcement thereof by Western Copper or Glamis, as the case may be, are hereby waived by them. However, if either party believes a restriction to be unduly burdensome, they may petition a court of competent jurisdiction to have the restriction modified or removed.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction by stating that all restrictions are considered reasonable and valid, and all defenses to enforcement are waived. The added sentence then allows a party to challenge those same restrictions in court, thus contradicting the waiver and creating uncertainty about the enforceability of the restrictions.
